subject: Football
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: Giants fans take great joy in watching Brandon Jacobs flatten defenders. At home, the supersized trash-talking running back is a soft-spoken dad who “will cry at the drop of a hat.”
snippet: Giants fans take great joy in watching Brandon Jacobs flatten defenders. At home, the supersized trash-talking running back is a soft-spoken dad who “will cry at the drop of a hat.”
